workflow.name: XDR - Automation -- Lock and Unlock Feature
workflow.title: XDR - Automation -- Lock and Unlock Feature

properties.description:
XDR - Automation -- Lock and Unlock Feature

Use Case to Verify Lock and Unlock 

	1.	Add sub-workflow action lock
	2.	Submitted for review/publish lock
	3.	Install workflow lock
	4.	Add/update automation rule wf lock from triggers page
properties.display_name: XDR - Automation -- Lock and Unlock Feature

properties.description:
Create a Workflow then Lock and try to Update a workflow 
Unlock it and then Update workflow Lock it again

Create a Workflow and Make it Atomic 

Create a Parent Workflow and above created atomic and Child workflow and check the locked status of the child and Atomic

Add Rule from wf desginer and Check the Locked status

Create Rule and wf from triggers Page and Verify the WF locked Status

Publish WF and Verify the Status of the Locked Status 
Install WF and Verify the Status of the Locked Status
